title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Design and Implementation of Mathematics Pedagogy Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Pedagogy and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners explain the theoretical foundations of blended learning and analyze success factors for application in mathematics education

Using VR simulation platforms (Unity/Unreal Engine) and smartphone apps (Android/iOS), the learner designs teaching models for three math concepts (e.g., fractions, geometry, statistics), executes one prototype within two weeks, and achieves over 80% satisfaction from five learners.

Through a 2-week project-based assessment (teams of 3–5), the learner analyzes three strengths and weaknesses of blended learning environments (online+offline) and proposes two data-driven improvement strategies in a 3-page proposal.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
